com.googlecode.objectify.impl.translate
Class ValueTranslator<P,D>

java.lang.Object
  com.googlecode.objectify.impl.translate.AbstractTranslator<T>
      com.googlecode.objectify.impl.translate.PropertyValueNodeTranslator<P>
          com.googlecode.objectify.impl.translate.ValueTranslator<P,D>
All Implemented Interfaces:
Translator<P>
public abstract class ValueTranslator<P,D>
extends PropertyValueNodeTranslator<P>

Helper which helps take a mapnode's property value and converts it from datastore representation to pojo representation. Note that null checking has already been done.

Author:
Jeff Schnitzer

loadValue

protected abstract P loadValue(D value,
                               LoadContext ctx)
                        throws SkipException
Decode from a property value as stored in the datastore to a type that will be stored in a pojo.

Parameters:
value - will not be null, that has already been tested for
Returns:
the format which should be stored in the pojo; a null means store a literal null!
Throws:
SkipException - if this field subtree should be skipped

saveValue

protected abstract D saveValue(P value,
                               SaveContext ctx)
                        throws SkipException
Encode from a normal pojo value to a format that the datastore understands. Note that a null return value is a literal instruction to store a null.

Parameters:
value - will not be null, that has already been tested for
Returns:
the format which should be stored in the datastore; null means actually store a null!
Throws:
SkipException - if this subtree should be skipped
